text: Ani allahane imana rakhanaryankarita phira'aunacya patnice udaharana sangitale. Jevha tine du'a (prarthana) keli ki he majhya palanakartya! Majhyasathi apalya javala jahannatamadhye eka ghara banava ani mala phira'aunapasuna va tyacya karmampasuna vacava ani mala atyacari lokampasuna mukti de
